description.line1: We maximize the efficiency of instructors, teachers, and freelancers in managing educational activities, tracking statistics, and improving communication with students and their guardians. If you value your time, want to streamline your work, and focus on what you do best - choose EduEventor! We'll take care of the rest!

items.title: What is EduEventor?
items.description: It's a very user-friendly system for group management, where you can add students, create fees for school or extracurricular activities, and view the history of all payments. For parents/guardians, the system enables quick online payments. You always know what you're paying for and how much!

items.title: Is it for you?
items.description: If you're doing many tasks manually, managing students, creating groups, and checking attendance will save you a lot of time! Also, if you're using complex and expensive systems that exceed your needs, you will love the simplicity and clarity of our solution.

items.title: Working with others?
items.description: If you're working with other teachers/instructors, the system simplifies logical management of various institutions. Your collaborators have access precisely and only to the organizations where they teach or conduct classes.

features.title: Features and Capabilities
features.subtitle: What can EduEventor do for you?
features.description: The system will handle the boring tasks that you currently have to do yourself. See what EduEventor can do for you.
featuresFootnotes: * Email messaging is under development – available soon.
** Separate fees for SMS, outside of selected package, charged separately per usage

items.name: Lesson planning and scheduling
items.description: We provide tools for easy and efficient lesson planning, helping you organize time, manage priorities, and maintain balance in your daily schedule.

items.name: Student and group management
items.description: We offer comprehensive solutions for managing students and groups to help you effectively create a dynamic, interactive educational environment.

items.name: Receiving online payments
items.description: We enable convenient and secure online payments, giving you fast and smooth financial transactions. Accept multiple payment methods, monitor transactions, and offer a seamless experience to your clients.

items.name: Email* and SMS** communication
items.description: We provide effective communication tools via email and SMS, helping you easily connect with students/guardians and send important notifications, maintaining strong relationships.

items.name: Attendance tracking
items.description: We offer convenient and accurate attendance tracking, so you can effectively monitor participation and track attendance history.

items.name: Cash or bank transfer payments
items.description: We make it easy to manage payments, track transaction history, and give you peace of mind knowing your clients can pay in their preferred method.

items.name: Online sign-ups
items.description: You can create an online sign-up form where students will sign-up for your course/workshop/event. This gives you confidence the data provided is as accurate as possible.

items.name: Statistics: attendance, costs, income
items.description: Our app makes it easy to track and evaluate attendance levels, monitor expenses, and analyze income. Our advanced statistics features allow for detailed reporting, trend identification, and informed business decisions.

items.name: Free access for students and/or guardians
items.description: Our app offers free access for students/guardians, letting them use core features without fees. They can follow schedules, view payment history, and pay for classes online.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.platformFeesDescription: * System fees apply due to integration with payment system. A fixed fee per online transaction. Does not apply to cash or bank transfers made outside of the application.

sections.title: Passion
paragraphs: We believe that passionate people have the power to make the world a better place. Our vision is to build the EduEventor platform that not only simplifies online payments for schools, teachers, instructors, and parents but also inspires and motivates people to take action.

We want to be part of a community committed to education and personal growth. Our platform is designed to support and simplify daily tasks for instructors and teachers so they can focus on what they truly love - sharing knowledge, developing skills, and inspiring others.

sections.title: Technology
paragraphs: We believe technology can be a tool for positive change. Our goal is to create a simple, intuitive, and secure environment for managing groups and making online payments efficiently and user-friendly. We want users to trust our platform and focus on their passion, knowing payments are secure and transparent.

That's why, as EduEventor, we aim to develop innovative solutions that simplify life for our users and drive progress in education. We believe together we can build a better, more inspiring future for our children and communities.
Join us and let's change the world together!

cookies.consentMessage: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, provide additional services, and analyze our traffic.

steps.title: Registration
paragraphs: Go to https://edueventor.com
Click one of the links:
[1] Login [2] Start today

steps.title: Registration
paragraphs: A login window will appear.
If you don’t have an account yet, click [3] ‘Register’
If you already have an account, [1] enter your username, password, and click Continue.
If you already have an account but forgot your password, click [2] ‘Forgot password?’

steps.title: Registration
paragraphs: Enter your email and create a password according to the instructions.
Then click Continue.

steps.title: Add dependent
paragraphs: After registering, you will be asked to provide your details.
Next, add your child/dependent to the system.

steps.title: Add dependent
paragraphs: Enter your child’s/dependent’s details: first name, last name, and ID number to find their record in the system.
The ID will be provided to you separately for data protection and security.
Click Find, and in the next step confirm the dependent’s details.

steps.title: Add dependent
paragraphs: The system will display your child’s/dependent’s details.
If needed, you can add more children/dependents [2].
